bill.title: Relating To Use Permits For Small Boat Harbor Facilities.
bill.description: Amends the various fees the Department of Land and Natural Resources may charge for the usage of state small boat harbors. Amends the manner in which those fees are applied. (SB1257 HD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to WTL, WAM.
The committee(s) on WTL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-04-19 1:15PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on WTL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WTL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Nishihara, Riviere; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from WTL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 251) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-15-19 10:15AM in conference room 211.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, Harimoto, Inouye, K. Kahele, Kanuha, Kidani, Moriwaki, Riviere, Shimabukuro, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) English, Taniguchi.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 730) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-05-19.
Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Inouye, Moriwaki. Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Harimoto). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 423) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to WLH, FIN, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by WLH on Friday, 03-15-19 10:00AM in House conference room 325.

The committees on WLH recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Todd, Har, Lowen, Tarnas, Wildberger; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Thielen; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from WLH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1520) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) McKelvey voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cabanilla Arakawa, Holt, Tokioka, Yamane excused (5).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 03-29-19 3:30PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Eli, Gates, Hashimoto, Holt, Kitagawa, Matayoshi, Nakamura, Nishimoto, Todd, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) B. Kobayashi; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Wildberger, McDermott.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2160) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-09-19.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) DeCoite, McKelvey voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 782).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 893).
Senate Conferees Appointed: K. Kahele Chair; Riviere Co-Chair; Moriwaki, Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 901).
House Conferees Appointed: Yamane, Todd Co-Chairs; Thielen.
Senate Conferees Changed: Senator Keith-Agaran added as Co-Chair. Senator Riviere discharged as Co-Chair.
Received notice of change in Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 908).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 813).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-23-19 10:30AM in conference room 312.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Wednesday 04-24-19 10:30AM in conference room 312.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-25-19 10:30AM in conference room 312.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-26-19 10:30AM in conference room 312.
